name: Data Deduplication and Compression Engineer (senior and middle)
description:
Huawei RRI is looking for a Senior and Middle developer to develop data compression/deduplication algorithms.

Huawei Cloud is one of the largest public clouds in the world, where thousands of petabytes of data are stored and sent. Therefore, Huawei, like other FAANG-level companies, not only uses existing compression algorithms, but also develops its own, based on specific needs.

We study the existing algorithms in this area, refine them, develop our own, implement, optimize and implement them in the systems being operated. Thus, this is a position at the junction of research and production.

In addition, an important aspect of your work will be interaction with Chinese colleagues to implement our solutions in production systems.

Responsibilities:

Responsibility for Middle Position：

  • Implement and develop data deduplication and compression algorithms in large scale networks, content delivery networks (CDN) and large-scale peer-assisted CDN.
  • Improve the existing data deduplication and compression algorithms.

Responsibility for Senior Position：

  • Do research on data deduplication and compression techniques in large scale networks, content delivery networks (CDN) and large-scale peer-assisted CDN.
  • Design data deduplication and compression algorithms in large scale networks, content delivery networks (CDN) and large-scale peer-assisted CDN.
  • Implement the designed algorithms or guide programmers to implement them.

Requirements:

Requirements for Middle Position:

  • PhD or Master in Computer Science, Mathematics, or another quantitative discipline.
  • At least 3 years’ experience of software development.
  • Technical English speaking, reading and writing.
  • Be good at one of programming languages, Python/Java/Go/C++.

Requirements for Senior Position:

  • PhD or Master in Computer Science, Mathematics, or another quantitative discipline.
  • At least 3 years’ experience on data compression and deduplication algorithm design and development.
  • Technical English speaking, reading and writing.
  • Data compression and deduplication algorithms.
  • Be good at one of programming languages, Python/Java/Go/C++.

Compensation and Office:

  • Opportunity to build the product that will be used by millions of people around the world.
  • Attractive compensation package + bonuses.
  • Medical insurance with dental care included and travel insurance.
  • Relocation bonus for candidates moving from other cities.
  • Opportunity for professional growth and career development.
  • Friendly team, interesting projects, opportunity for business trips.
  • Comfortable office in the center of Moscow.
